001package com.edbplus.db.jpa.task;
002
003import cn.hutool.core.util.ReflectUtil;
004import com.edbplus.db.EDbPro;
005import com.jfinal.plugin.activerecord.SqlPara;
006
007import java.lang.reflect.Field;
008import java.util.concurrent.Callable;
009
010public class JpaRelTask implements Callable<Object> {
011
012    private Class<?> jpaClass;
013    private SqlPara sqlPara;
014    private EDbPro eDbPro;
015    private Object oriJpa;
016    private Field field;
017    private boolean isList = false;
018
019    public JpaRelTask(Object oriJpa,Field oriJpaField,Class<?> jpaClass, SqlPara sqlPara, EDbPro eDbPro,boolean isList){
020        this.jpaClass = jpaClass;
021        this.sqlPara = sqlPara;
022        this.eDbPro = eDbPro;
023        this.oriJpa =oriJpa;
024        this.field = oriJpaField;
025        this.isList = isList;
026    }
027
028    @Override
029    public Object call() throws Exception {
030        Object object = null;
031        if(isList){
032            object = eDbPro.find(jpaClass, sqlPara);
033        }else{
034            object = eDbPro.findFirst(jpaClass, sqlPara);
035        }
036        System.out.println("===运行===");
037        // 字段赋值 -- 反射赋值会比较消耗毫秒数
038        ReflectUtil.setFieldValue(oriJpa, field, object);
039
040        return object;
041    }
042
043}
